title: (x) J.T.Smith sans serif - Arial w/Futura caps {Yves}
content:
Can someone ID this font. It has qualities/details similar to Arial, Abadi and Futura. None match all the fonts - maybe a cheap imitation or can someone direct me to the correct font

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jtsmith.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052040/http:/typophile.com/files/jtsmith.jpg) | 41.74 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: Compressed Arial with Gill Sans caps!? Whoa, freaky!
Ach no, I think the caps are Futura. It’s not easy to identify when it’s horibly squooshed like that. :-/

i guess it is a mix of Arial Black and Futura Extra Bold Condensed. Gill Sans can’t be right, the UC J descends below the baseline.

Ugh!
That’s what threw me off as well — the caps are from a different font than the lowercase.
I was just about to start cooking, and I already lost my appetite… :-(
